title: LF ADC main(s) to climb to Challenger with
body:
Hi guys, I am the god support himself. I am doing my placements now. I anticipate I will be placed anywhere between Bronze 5 and Challenger.

I require a really good ADC to support. I am a god at support, which means ADC must also be god at his/her role. Please, only contact if you're certain you are a Challenger stuck in Bronze like me.
